metadata.title: CVE-2021-22217 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability in all versions of GitLab CE/EE before13.12.2, 13.11.5 or 13.10.5 allows an attacker to cause uncontrolledresource consumption with a specially crafted issue or merge request

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
